text: Magar jab woh unko bacha leta hai to phir wahi log haqq se munharif hokar zameen mein bagawat karne lagte hain. Logon, tumhari yeh bagawat ulti tumhare hi khilaf padh rahi hai, duniya ke chandh roza mazey hain (loot lo), phir hamari taraf tumhein palat kar aana hai, us waqt hum tumhein bata denge ke tum kya kuch karte rahey ho
